title: Get wet again
brief_description: More fun with Jonathan Coleman. In this program his nervous “brother” Terry learns to swim - with the assistance of Lisa Forrest. The emphasis is on feeling at ease in the water and includes activities such as blowing bubbles, floating, basic swimming and rescue.
